about_the_game:
Celebrate 2017 Darlington NASCAR Throwback Weekend with 41 throwback paint schemes! This expansion includes throwback schemes for all 3 National series! Also included are 3 new Challenges and spotter guidance courtesy of Alex Hayden of MRN.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Joey Logano #22 Shell Pennzoil Ford Throwback
Dale Earnhardt Jr. #88 Nationwide Chevrolet Throwback
Jimmie Johnson #48 Lowe's Chevrolet Throwback
Chase Elliott #24 NAPA Chevrolet Throwback
…

NXS:
Cole Custer #00 Haas Automation Ford Throwback
William Byron #9 Liberty Chevrolet Throwback
Kevin Harvick #41 Hunt Brothers Pizza Ford Throwback
…

CWTS:
John Hunter Nemechek #8 Fire Alarm Services Chevrolet Throwback
Austin Cindric #19 Draw Tite Ford Throwback

Plus, many more!

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!

name: NASCAR Heat 2 - October Jumbo Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better

esrb.descriptors: Online Interactions not Rated by ESRB
